metadata.title: CVE-2022-44232 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libming 0.4.8 0.4.8 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow. In getInt() indecompile.c unknown type may lead to denial of service. This is a differentvulnerability than CVE-2018-9132 and CVE-2018-20427.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
